archimate:Principle.name: Sovrin Entity
archimate:Principle.documentation: A classification of an Entity that is described by Sovrin Identity Data including at least one Sovrin DID. A Sovrin Entity must be either an Identity Owner or a Thing. A Sovrin Entity may play the role of the Subject, Issuer, Holder, Prover, and/or Verifier of a Credential. Mutually exclusive with Other Entity.
